title: Client screen pixelated

embed.description: Gyazo lets you instantly grab the screen and upload the image/GIF to the web. You can easily share them on Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

body: ok so I've noticed that my login and game client are heavily pixelated. Not sure what's causing it, but the client launcher is completely fine, it's just the log in screen and in game client. All my other games run/display as normal as well so I don't think it's an issue on my end? although I did try repairing the client and that didn't achieve anything, but my lol client was fine yesterday and I didn't encounter this problem until now and I didn't change any settings between then and now either. Any help would be appreciated.

replies.body:
Hey Krebitz,

This might be due to a driver issue. Please try updating your graphics drivers, and if that doesn't work, try reinstalling the driver(s).
